description: This file initializes an Agent with a specific LMStudio model and demonstrates how to run a prompt and print the response, likely as part of a larger application or testing setup.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent class that interacts with language models, capable of running prompts and handling responses.

classes.name: RunResponseEvent
classes.description: Represents an event in the response stream from the agent.

classes.name: LMStudio
classes.description: A model class representing the LMStudio language model configuration.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method of the Agent class to print the response for a given prompt, optionally streaming.
